job1.title: Web Developer
description: Work closely with cross-functional teams and customers to define project milestones, develop the technical roadmap, and estimate timelines for feature rollouts and upgrades.

Serve as Scrum leader, facilitating daily stand-ups and sprint planning meetings to resolve conflicts, encourage creative solutions, and maintain clear communication for efficient progress across the team.
Lead the front-end migration of the company's website from WordPress to a modern stack, utilizing React and JavaScript to improve user experience and increase website speed by 10+ times.
Coordinate with others on the backend development using Python and AWS, enhancing scalability and reliability of the website's infrastructure.
Streamline development processes by identifying inefficiencies and implementing solutions, reducing load times and increasing website uptime, which led to improved user engagement and retention.

job2.title: Software Engineering Intern
description: Developed and refined React components while learning the framework on the job, contributing to feature builds in an agile environment.
Collaborated with a distributed team across multiple locations, fostering strong communication and teamwork in a remote-first setting.
Adapted quickly to new technologies and workflows, enabling meaningful contributions to full-stack development projects.
Partnered with an experienced mentor to gain in-depth knowledge of the tech stack and development processes, bridging theoretical knowledge with practical application.
